data.text:
Full Name

Lauren Michael Holly

Birthdate

October 28, 1963

Occupation

Actress

Years Active

1986-1989

Lauren Holly appeared on daytime from 1986-1989 as Julie Chandler on All My Children. Holly has gone on to appear on numerous TV series and feature films, including Picket Fences, Chicago Hope and NCIS.

Personal Life[]

Holly was married to Francis Greco from 2001 to 2014.They share three children: Alexander Joseph (b. 2001), George and Henry. Holly was previously married to Danny Quinn (1991-1993) and Jim Carrey (1996-1997).

Soapography[]

Julie Chandler on All My Children (1986-1989)

Awards and Nominations[]

Daytime Emmy Awards

YEAR CATEGORY CHARACTER/SERIES W/N 1988 Ingenue Julie Chandler, All My Children N
